title: $:/plugins/Telumire/PLM
name: PLM
author: Telumire
version-0.0.3:
* Improved the tabs in the plugin viewer
** Added history tab + version increment
** The history editor area use the editor macro to enable keyboard shortcuts
** Empty tabs are hidden
** The first non-empty tab from the tablist will be displayed by default
* Drag&drop from the PLM plugin list or single plugin view now properly include the extra tiddlers
* Custom [[title view template|$:/plugins/Telumire/PLM/ViewTemplate/title/nav]] to navigate plugins content
